Hi David,

On 1/29/07, David Saff <saff@...> wrote:
>  Java web frameworks are way behind in [built-in testing frameworks],
>  but I'd be happy to find out that there is a framework that ships with a
>  usable test framework.

The closest I've come to is Wicket, which lets you test your
components (it's a component-based web framework) with a utility class
called WicketTester:

  http://wicket.sourceforge.net/apidocs/wicket/util/tester/WicketTester.html

Lasse
